Keywords: Arakko , Brute , Horsemen , Ruler , Warrior
Real Name: Genesis
Special Powers
(+5 POINTS) SWORD BEARER: This character starts the game with any Sword equipment equipped.
ARAKKO IS NOT A LAND FOR THE WEAK: When determining themed teams, characters with the Brute, Monster, or Warrior keywords gain the Arakko keyword. // When a friendly character with the Arakko keyword uses Blades/Claws/Fangs, their minimum result is instead their printed damage +1.
MARCH ACROSS OTHERWORLD: Charge, Flurry. Passenger: 4, but only to carry characters with the Arakko keyword.
DESTRUCTIVE PARRY: STOP. Invincible, Super Senses. Each time this click is revealed due to taking damage from an attack, KO an object equipped to the attacker. If the attacker was not equipped, deal them 1 penetrating damage.
(+5 POINTS) SWORD BEARER: This character starts the game with any Sword equipment equipped.

MARCH ACROSS OTHERWORLD: Charge, Flurry. Passenger: 4, but only to carry characters with the Arakko keyword.

August 12, 2022
bam
SO EPIC. She may not beat characters like g.e. DOOM 100 percent of the time, but she is but she is in the conversation. Her 300 point defense line is just CRAZY. IF she ever does get knocked down she will likely heal up. This is a character that should be on any team that fights OG colossal characters like 2004 Galactus & the Spectre because she is just so darn survivable. Her Charge Flurry for 7 damage each hit is also just plain crazy & on the level of Crisis KC Superman.
